title: (x) Sans serif used by Droog collective - FF DIN {Conor, David Lawless}
content:
Hi,

I would very happy if anybody here could identify this font:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328212826im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/52_6Lg_4292.jpg)

Tom

 [‹ Looking for the \*exact\* font used for the GUESS Jeans logo (similar to Times)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328212826/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34477 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Connected upright script "Lula" for use on a knitting book - Kursivschrift {Mike Y} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328212826/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34457 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tomnichols
